1.0.0.name: wordpress/tweetbutton-for-wordpress
1.0.0.description:
Easily allows your blog post or page to be retweeted. It provides a live count of how many times your post/page has been retweeted throughout Twitter. Currently being by SocialBrite and other members of the social media community.

Features

  • Live count of tweets from Twitter

  • Allows you to change the source which you retweet, e.g. " via @yourname"

  • Easily installation and customization

  • Better integration, allowing custom titles, related accounts

  • Integrates with Wordpress MU
